metadata.name: Passion
metadata.description:
This is the 1st NFT in a collection of 10 photographs issued in a single, unique edition.

Photo: 2624 x 3935 px

Clothing hugs every part of the body. 
The open areas are caressed by a warm breeze. 
You can smell the aroma of expensive perfume in the air. 
The clicks of the camera can be heard. 

The atmosphere is filled with passion and tenderness.
